message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40, and we both walk away happy.  It's in our best interest to settle this now before inflation eats away at the value.

Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for my liking. Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  The value of the money decreases with each round, so it's in your best interest to accept this offer.
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting us both.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly before we both lose out more.
